```{r load-packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(dunn.test)
```

```{r load-data}
vertical_all <- read.csv("data/vertical_all.csv")

expanded_inverts_mdr <- read.csv("data/expanded_inverts_mdr.csv")

expanded_seaweeds_mdr <- read.csv("data/expanded_seaweeds_mdr.csv")

```

```{r kruskal-wallis-Litt_o}

# is this doing what I think it's doing?

expanded_inverts_mdr %>%
  filter(invert_species == "Litt_o")%>%
  #filter(year %in% c(2022, 2023)) %>%
  #filter(!is.na(count)) %>%
  # select(year, count) %>%
  kruskal.test(count ~ year)

expanded_inverts_mdr %>%
  filter(invert_species == "Litt_o")%>%
  select(year, count) %>%
```
